doc.title: Onedottv
doc.plot: onedottv is an eclectic anthology of original, independent and progressive work by directors, new media artists and graphic designers featured in the onedotzero digital film festival. Including work by Chris Cunningham, OS2, MMS Fuel, tomato, Andy Martin, Underbelly, Antirom, ISO, Hexstatic, Soliton Wave, Honey Brothers, Milk, Film Unit AV, Spin and Dylan Kendle
